Package gdi.game

package gdi.game
Classes that are needed to provide the most basic game-world infrastructure
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gdi.game.dominion
    All classes supporting the Dominion game
    gdi.game.map
    Classes supporting map-based games.
    gdi.game.sprite
    Classes supporting sprite-based games.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    World
    The base class of a game.
    WorldObject
    A class that helps managing Objects that need to reference a world.
